entry.title: Thursday night: Snow. Temperature rising to minus 4 by morning.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 4 by morning. Wind chill minus 13 this evening and minus 6 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Thursday 29 December 2022

entry.title: Friday: Light snow. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Light snow ending in the morning then cloudy. Risk of freezing rain in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 6 in the morning. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Thursday 29 December 2022

entry.title: Friday night: Rain. Temperature rising to plus 5 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Rain beginning early in the evening and ending overnight. Risk of freezing rain early in the evening. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the evening. Temperature rising to plus 5 by morning. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Thursday 29 December 2022
